revision.text:
<!--군인_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = MilitaryPerson
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 태어난 곳 | ontologyProperty = birthPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 죽은 곳 | ontologyProperty = deathPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 별명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:nick }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 복무 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{DateIntervalMapping
          | templateProperty = 복무 기간
          | startDateOntologyProperty = serviceStartYear 
          | endDateOntologyProperty = serviceEndYear
        }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 서훈 내역 | ontologyProperty = award }}
end}}



<!-- Not Yet Mapping
|최종 계급 =
|근무 =
|지휘 =
|주요 참전 전투/전쟁 =
|기타 이력 =
-->
